content: NPR PA Actuator Actuators for NPR PR press rings. Compatible with NPR 32-A pipe press tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Inserts for pressing, crimping & cutting- - ### FEATURES:Features Equipped with NFC tag for easier identification and management via the Hilti Connect app and ON!Track tool tracking software Special hardening process for higher reliability Applications NPR PA 2 actuator for most press ring applications NPR PA 1 actuator for NPR PR U 75, 90 and 110, and for NPR PR V 64, 76, 89 and 108 NPR PA 3 actuator for NPR PR M 76.1 and 88.9 NPR PA 3 and NPR PA 4 actuator for NPR PR M 108 (2 press cycles) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Press profile: n/a Service interval: 1 year Technical Data | Press profile | n/a | Service interval | 1 year ### ITEMS- 2206273 - Actuator jaws NPR PA 3 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PA 3 pipe pressing Actuator jaws - 2228526 - Actuator jaws NPR PA 5 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PA 5 pipe pressing Actuator jaws - 2206272 - Actuator jaws NPR PA 2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PA 2 pipe pressring Actuator jaws
